post:
Hello,

We have couple of spare VPS, which we had purchased for Build / Test / R&D...and some of them are not used at all. So instead of keeping them idle, we wish to give them away to some of you developers so at least you can make use of them for your R&D / Build.



**here is the std config:**
Disk Space 30 GB
Bandwidth 	1 TB
Memory 	1 GB
VSwap 	1.25 GB
IPv4 	1
Data center Location	 London, UK
Control Panel	 Vesta Cp

Should you be interested please ping me on niket.jain at dial2verify dot in
OR write us at developer at dial2verify dot in

*** Boxes should not be used for illegal, unethical, spam purposes.**
